title: SDIG Nilantha Jayawardena transferred
body_lines: Central Province Senior DIG Nilantha Jayawardena has been transferred as the Senior DIG of Support Services, the police media unit announced today.
Meanwhile, DIG Priyantha Weerasuriya who was holding the post has received a transfer as Senior DIG of the Central Province.
According to the police media unit, the transfers were given based on service requirements.
